titles.title: Gang Activity Reporting Act of 2023
Gang Activity Reporting Act of 2023
To amend title 28, United States Code, to require the Attorney General to submit an annual report to Congress on gang activity, reporting, investigation, and prosecution, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Gang Activity Reporting Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of Justice to report on gang activity, reporting, investigation, and prosecution.
